add_subscription.q: How do I add a new subscription?
add_subscription.a: Tap the '+' button on the dashboard, choose a service or create a custom one, enter the price and renewal date, then save.

edit_subscription.q: How can I edit or update a subscription?
edit_subscription.a: Open the subscription from the dashboard and tap 'Edit'. You can update price, frequency, category, or renewal date.

renewal_reminders.q: How do I set up renewal reminders?
renewal_reminders.a: Renewal reminders are automatic. Trakio tracks renewal dates and shows upcoming payments in advance.

currencies.a: Yes. Each subscription can have its own currency. You can also set a base currency in Settings.

backup_data.q: How do I back up my data?
backup_data.a: Go to Settings ‚Üí Data Management to export your subscriptions and payment history as CSV or JSON.

premium_features.q: What features are included in Premium?
premium_features.a: Premium includes analytics, budget tracking, payment history export, alerts, and advanced insights.

delete_subscription.q: How do I delete a subscription?
delete_subscription.a: Swipe left on a subscription or open it and tap 'Delete'.

custom_categories.a: Yes. Custom categories are available with Premium.

browse: Browse common questions or reach out to support.
our_support: Our support team is happy to help you.

premium.expires_notice: Premium will expire on {{date}}. You can resubscribe anytime.
premium.expired_notice: Premium has expired. Upgrade to regain access.

payment.failed_notice: Payment failed. Please update your billing details to avoid losing premium access.

projection.title: Projection for {{range}}
projection.description: Estimated spending based on your recent subscription payments.
